## Data load & summary
```{r, echo=FALSE}
require(ggplot2)
require(reshape2)

heat <- read.csv("Heatmap.csv", header = TRUE)
```

## Data subgroup & melt.
```{r, echo=FALSE}
heatsub <- heat[1:2]
heatsub <- cbind.data.frame(heatsub, heat[21:26])

heatsub.m <- melt(heatsub)
```


## Plot heat map
```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(heatsub.m, aes(variable, Gene.name)) + geom_tile(aes(fill = value)) + scale_fill_gradient2 (high = "#FF0000", low = "#0000FF", mid = "white")

```
